lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner. My firm conducts market research in the US on new products in a wide variety of industries.

lender.name: Arvada, CO UCC
lender.loan_because: We care.

lender.name: A Stones Throw Jewelry

lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all interconnected throughout the world. I want to give others the opportunity to be successful business people.

lender.loan_because: it might help

lender.name: Anya & Rick
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Coaching is a privilege not to mention challenging and inspiring. The following quote by Micheangelo best captures what motivates us. "The greatest danger for most of us is not that we aim too high and miss it, but that we aim too low and reach it."

lender.name: Seren
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus.
lender.occupational_info: I work with youth who have a difficult time controlling their behavior. Usually this is because they have come from dangerous, family situations where their parents abused them, used drugs, or have abandoned them.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I'm interested to see how it all works. I find micro-finance complimentary to Philanthropy which is the field I worked in for the 5 years prior to becoming a Kiva Fellow.
lender.occupational_info: I listen, learn, manage, synthesis information for Kiva lenders, and then journal and blog about it all while being a cultural representative of the United States, the lovely city of San Francisco, and Kiva.

lender.name: jit_bag
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. Teach a man to fish...

lender.name: derrick
lender.loan_because: I support independence and the art of building and sustaining something.
lender.occupational_info: I build things: some fantastical;some practical. And I help other people build things.

lender.name: China Sonrisa
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate from a relative. And after reading about Kiva, it is a very good thing to help people that want to do for their community and try to make a better life for them selves. I will pray for them, and our world all around us.
lender.occupational_info: I am a part owner in a Truck shop. We build working trucks from small to big. We also sell all the accessories that go on these trucks.

lender.name: Tim & Regine
lender.loan_because: If not us then who ?
lender.occupational_info: We have two young daughters. Enjoy cooking, gardening, music, reading and meditation. We live near mountains and a lake. We try to be happy and appreciate what we have.

lender.name: Love Coach Rinatta
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who believe they can make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I support people in living their dreams of a deeply loving, fulfilling relationship.

lender.name: Wilma
lender.loan_because: To help someone else get a good start in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired school teacher and minister's wife who works with my husband helping in churches who are without a current pastor.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to open a business & how grateful I was that I was able to borrow money from friends & family.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small cafe serving breakfast & lunch with my business partner. I work in the front serving customers & then take care of the accounting after work.

lender.name: Annabelle
lender.loan_because: my grandmother, pictured here, was very much in the same situation as many of those seeking loans on this site. She came from a poor farming background, in Southern Illinois, USA, had to leave school early, lost her husband at an early age due to a stroke, but managed to inspire her four children to finish school. She passed away a few years ago, so I would like to pay her contribution to our family forward and help others get a head start towards making their lives and their children's lives better.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it creates sustainable value.
lender.occupational_info: I advise companies on financial matters.

lender.name: Ilana and Adam
lender.occupation: Rabbi and Musician (a newly married couple)

lender.name: Ann Ferriday
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro financing stimulates socioeconomic growth and world economy and I would like to help offer the opportunity to people to follow their dreams and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I design and manufacture my own brand of women's clothing, which I distribute in many countries.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: "It is more blessed to give than to receive." Acts 20:35

lender.name: Genevieve
lender.loan_because: I joined Kiva because I believe in the power of business to combat poverty and create opportunity. It puts a smile on my face to be part of making available the resources (financial, medical, educational, etc) that allow people to change their lives if they so desire.

lender.name: Guabo
lender.whereabouts: Playa - Tulum - Palenque Quintana Roo - Chiapas
lender.loan_because:
"I believe that to teach a man how to fish is better than just giving him fish"
4 me Micro financing is a digital extension of that. CLEARLY Todays charities are not nurturing anything other than a sick dependence that is almost always organised & administered from the same framework of the oppressive bureaucracies of the developed world.
"CHARITY OUGHT NEVER BE ORGANISED"
Trespeso Music was my own personal mission to assist in a communities development in an artistic musical & economic way. I am happy to help elsewhere when I can, Kiva seems to be a good platform to participate on an individual level.
lender.occupational_info: 24/7 Grind forever trying to turn events and situations into positive out comes. -Lots of time promoting & researching online -Networking with like minded business people and artists -some graphic design -some translations -lots of creative tinkering in the digital formats

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: My kids gave me a gift certificate for Mother's Day! They said it was a perfect gift for someone who taught them to always give to others and help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: My husband & I own a business that builds mobility equipment for the disabled and elderly.

lender.name: Natalie J
lender.loan_because: We would like to contribute in a positive way so we can effect whole communities rather than only the invidual.
lender.occupational_info: We help people pay off their home loans and plan their financial future.

lender.loan_because: We would like to share some of the benefits that we have been fortunate enough to enjoy in our lives and help support other people in making their own choices.

lender.loan_because: helping others.

lender.loan_because: We have been very lucky and want to share with others. We always remember people who gave us a hand when we were starting out.
lender.occupational_info: We are both research psychologists. Sunny investigates education policies and Larence is a professor.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I want to reach across borders and boundaries to help those who have a vision and are striving to manifest its creation.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a child abuse investigator for a large county agency. I investigate situations in which children are reportedly neglected or abused. Often, I work with law enforcement, health care and court.

lender.name: Sue & family
lender.loan_because: We are so lucky to live here in Australia. This is a great opportunity to help others who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Weldon
lender.loan_because: It's safer than stocks and it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I write books about boats and ships so mechanics can fix them.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Big business and big politics do not help the average person. I would like to be a part of something where I can make a contribution that directly enables someone to build a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the finances for a non-profit organization that helps children receive mental health services regardless of whether they or their families can afford to pay.

lender.name: Peter Dobias
lender.loan_because: because I feel when people have a better life, animals benefit too.
lender.occupational_info: Dr. Dobias Healing Solutions is a unique company providing online veterinary holistic consultation and natural holistic care products for animals and their people. DDHS is an excellent source of information and education in the area of holistic animal healthcare, nutrition and well being. The company’s founder, Dr Peter Dobias - a veterinarian – has a background in both holistic and conventional veterinary medicine, animal homeopathy and natural nutrition and more than 20 years of practical and teaching experience. Dr Dobias Healing Solutions was established to make natural and holistic forms of healing more readily available. The company’s goal is to provide people with an effective alternative to conventional veterinary care, holistic consulting services. Our goal is to treat effectively and eliminate or reduce pharmaceuticals used during treatment. We also love sharing knowledge and educating people about the benefits of disease prevention and holistic healing on their pets, their own health, the environment and the economy. DDHS also provides an online gathering place and support to people interested in animal holistic healing and provides reliable information and education. The current state of medicine in most countries shows that despite technological progress, the incidence of chronic degenerative diseases and unnecessary suffering of both animals and people is still very prevalent. Our society’s reliance on pharmaceutically oriented research has created a situation that is not sustainable. Most developed countries spend more than 50% of their tax revenue on health care while drug and medical equipment costs are skyrocketing. Most importantly, no one can put a cost on the physical and emotional suffering that, in many cases, could be easily prevented. We hope that through our company’s work , education, research and charity we will be able to contribute some solutions to these problems. We offer our clients an easy-to-follow plan to achieve pets’ health and longevity which can be extended to human health as well. We show our clients where health problems originate and how to prevent them in the first place. We invite people to join our effort in the transformation of the medical establishment into an effective healing system that emphasises prevention and promotes harmony between the body, mind and soul. Throughout the human history, our society has undergone major transformations. We have eliminated slavery, aimed for gender and racial equality, and made major progress in other areas of our society. Now it is the animals turn. They deserve our attention and we hope that people will join our growing community. We need to ensure that all pets, wild or farm animals are treated with the respect, care and dignity they deserve. They are our are our allies and fellow cohabitants of this planet and deserve the very best.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I do ok, and I think we should all be able to do ok.

lender.name: Jara
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves access to credit

lender.occupational_info: I teach year 7-12 (12-18 year old) students at a Christian school.

lender.loan_because: To enable others all over the world to start and improve their own business.

lender.name: sabine
lender.loan_because: Ich bin sehr dankbar, dass ich in einem Land geboren wurde, wo man immer viel Unterstützung bekommt. Als ich die Idee hatte mich selbständig zu machen, gab es unterschiedlichste Stellen, die mich bei meinem Vorhaben sowohl finanziell, als auch auf anderen Ebenen unterstützt haben! Jetzt bin ich soweit, dass ich dieses Geschenk, dass ich bekam, weitergeben kann... und das tue ich sehr, sehr gerne!!

lender.occupational_info: im a highschool student classes in grade 11

lender.name: Jonathan

lender.occupational_info: Ben is an Architect, designing homes, churches and museums in the New England area. Alli does marketing and business development for a larger Architecture firm which designs innovative and sustainable (ecofriendly) spaces for companies.

I wish I had found this site years ago so I could already have helped more businesses get off the ground.

lender.name: 2 Sticks Digital
lender.loan_because: Others helped us, and now we're in a position to help others.
lender.occupational_info: A Melbourne based Digital Marketing agency specialising in commercial web strategy, Search Engine Optimisation, Search Engine Marketing (Google AdWords), video advertising, customised mapping, viral marketing, Online Reputation Management, website analytics, enterprise wiki's, virtual reality (Second Life), and Web2.0 in-house training.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: As a Canadian, I have always had easy access to funding and education to support my career goals. Through microlending, I enjoy being part of a movement that supports the re-distribution of this tremendous privilege to those who, through no fault of their own, have not been as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I help people use their talents and abilities to their fullest potential. In turn, they are better able to make their highest contribution in their work, family and community.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to empower people to start up their businesses in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I provide individual therapy for the adult mentally ill.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: We all become stronger through interdependence.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information they need for work, study, and life.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.occupational_info: I am an environmental studies major in my junior year of college.

lender.name: Lola
lender.loan_because: I wish to honor my ancestors. It is because of their sacrifices, values and hard work that I enjoy the blessings I do today. I celebrate hardworking entrepreneurial people and want them to find encouragement and hope in the promise of a better future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze investment opportunities and bring capital sources together with promising opportunities.

lender.name: Robin and Ted
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others, and I think this is a wonderful opportunity to build positive connections around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor. I help people with advanced stage cancer.

lender.name: Westy
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: We've all needed a helping hand at some time.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I WAS BLESSED TO BE A BLESSING. JESUS CHRIST IS THE ONLY WAY TO ETERNAL LIFE.

lender.name: Chantal
lender.loan_because: Because God is good. And he gave us the ultimate gift a savior Jesus! All the glory to Him!

lender.name: Bree
lender.loan_because: To create hope in my son's world.
lender.occupational_info: I do everything in the office that needs to be done except the legal work itself.

lender.name: Brian & Family
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with so much; it is one way we can love and empower others through those blessings.
lender.occupational_info: eye care and vision provider.

lender.name: Gus
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be able to do so
lender.occupational_info: My company makes airplane kits for our customers to assemble and fly

lender.name: Eunice & Krys
lender.loan_because: The Lord has been good to us during our life and we wish to help others in a small way.

lender.name: sheryl mae
lender.loan_because: to pay my school fees

lender.name: samia
lender.loan_because: iam samia and doing a businss of clothes selling iam married and large family to support i need 650$
lender.occupational_info: i have a little work of clothes selling and have less money to expand my business

lender.name: Emie
lender.loan_because: I long to help those who are in need, giving sustainable help not just a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mommy to four adorable kiddos and share the love of Jesus in whatever city, country and continent I may be on at the moment!

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: Micro lending is a great way to help people
lender.occupational_info: Building retail shopping centers

lender.name: Hening
lender.loan_because: I need more funds to help more teenagers in Indonesia to continue their school.
lender.occupational_info: To develop and to help underprivileged teenagers to continue their school and to achieve success in training programs and micro-entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: At last I feel "globalized" in a good sense. Just no way to pass up the opportunity to lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I focus always on helping people. I use technology to assist me in this effort on most occasions.

lender.name: Thor
lender.loan_because: I am working worldwide and I spend my time off in the Dominican Republic. I know how the poor people there struggle to keep their life together. I'm more than happy to help someone willing to start a small business to support their family.
lender.occupational_info: Oilfield engineer at present working in the Middle East.

lender.name: Susann
lender.loan_because: to support mothers in the name of mother earth

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help others help themselves, it feels good and I thank God that I am in a position to do so. May God bless them all.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I have a heart for women
lender.occupational_info: I worked with children who have problems learning

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Aziz HASANOĞLU
lender.occupational_info: I am working in a private school which keeps educating mentally disabled schools.Its the first school in Marmara Region,Turkey.The central government keeps paying 300 USD per student but it still not enough because they all come from poor families.

lender.name: Maria Ejarque
lender.loan_because: I believe empowering individuals is the best way to surpass inequalities

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: If not me then who
lender.occupational_info: Travel to Bangladesh, Thailand and Kazakhstan to set up computer software for employee data

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: if we all do a part we can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Traveller on a journey through this temporary life.

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, and I truly think I can, for the first time in my life! Also, it's a wonderful experience to invest in people with great courage. I wish that many many people will get to know about this and will help make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I assist the department administrator of a University department (anaesthetics), as well as the head of the department. It's not the most exciting job but I have loads of lovely colleagues and a nice working environment.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: My business wouldn't be successful today if I had not received a loan to begin!

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: Giving is a gift we give ourselves.......

lender.name: Lloyd
lender.loan_because: trying to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Uninspiring, but loaning money to people who can use it to improve their lives is priceless!

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: especially after spending time in Kenya, I have learned that one of the best ways to make an impact in the world is through more personal relationships.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a public school; kids ages 5-11; mostly 9 year olds. I also spend a lot of time serving with my church building a relationship with a community in northern Kenya.

lender.name: Martha McGinnis
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I respect the courage of these borrowers and the challenges they face. I am also deeply grateful for all the benefits, opportunities, and assistance I've received in my own life. This is a wonderful way to pass some of that along to others.
lender.occupational_info: People in business and organizations hold a lot of meetings, and spend a lot of time, money and energy doing it. However, they often don't remember them very well afterward. My job is to listen very carefully during a meeting, and to capture what's important. So, while it's all happening, I am creating a wall-sized mural that's a colorful combination of words and images. Later, people use the mural and smaller re-prints to remember, discuss, and share what happened. The murals also go into slide shows, newsletters, and onto websites--the whole point is to make better use of the meeting! My biggest role though, is to LISTEN...most people don't do that very well!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to see more people make the shift to being business owners and do whatever I can to help.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a partner in a company that creates new software businesses.
http://www.muralventures.com

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: it allows the people to be in control of their own destiny

lender.name: Harish
lender.loan_because: I can, and because they need it more than I do right now.

lender.name: Purti Awal
lender.loan_because: I believe that small things can change the world, if we all just do our part

lender.name: Christa & Norberto
lender.loan_because: We feel satisfied that we can help others in their effort to sustain themselves and their families through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: We travel quite a bit and we have always been impressed by so many people in need.

lender.name: Claude
lender.loan_because: Just because I trust in humans and I know a little can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am taking care of programs running on a pc or a server to help people do their jobs (it can be, for exemple, a program to save the informations about all the clients of a companie).

lender.name: Joe S.
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Video Producer Commercials/Documentaries

lender.name: Delayne Ann
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for helping others in need who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help folks who want to heal in a natural and whole manner and want a healthy lifestyle

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: It is important to help - and the best way is in supporting people to earn their own money.

lender.name: Just a family...
lender.loan_because: We have everything we need, and want everyone else to have the same.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I need to save money for taxes and I would like it to do some good in the world while it waits to go to the government.

lender.name: Yasmin
lender.loan_because: I realize that the social connections that underly globalized trade are more than just the abstract buying and selling of goods- the very real lives of very real people that are inextricably wound to my decisions are at stake.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Geography and Architecture at the University of Texas at Austin.

lender.name: Blanche
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone a CHANCE. I can't give a lot, but it's an honor to give another person a chance!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I've been the beneficiary of some wonderful opportunities in my own life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach piano to people of all ages at one of the country's largest community music schools.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Economics drives the world.
lender.occupational_info: Connecting people, companies and ideals around the globe via social media.

lender.name: Hannele
lender.loan_because: I want to help ordinary people in need who are active themselves. We all can do something to help each other and tyr to make the world a better place to live.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a teacher language teacher (English, German, Swedish) in Waldorf school. Since 1995 in Seinäjoki, now in in Tampere. The work is challenging, interesting and rewarding. I try my best to give my pupils something they need. But mostly I think the pupils have taught me more than I them. I have been to many schools, but Waldorf school is my place. It sees people as a whole and I appreciate the values my collegues have.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I want to speed the increase of sustainability and quality of life around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I figure out the best way to put software together for people using both science and creativity.

lender.name: Jing Feng
lender.loan_because: i believe in 'service above self'. if we can spend 25bucks a week on stuff that we dont really need, i believe we can use it for a greater cause. most imptly, this is a direct way of helping those who really need help
lender.occupational_info: still a student

lender.name: Rolf
lender.loan_because: In our word the money is unfortunately not distributed fair and this is a good way to improve that.

lender.name: Colin & Jeanette
lender.loan_because: Because even though we don't have a lot of money, we have enough to help someone else improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: We help people protect their ideas and their money!

lender.name: Daisy
lender.loan_because: I care and support Kiva's mission in helping others. "If I can give I will and if I can't, I'll try"
lender.occupational_info: I'm blessed to work with a diverse group of intelligent people with whom I can learn from. I have the opportunity for a better future and would love to help others receive the same blessings in return.

lender.name: Arthur & Janice
lender.loan_because: because we like to help other people!!
